# Directives Docs

## Directives

- [#Const](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/directives/const-directive.md): Learn more about: #Const Directive
- [#ExternalSource](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/directives/externalsource-directive.md): Learn more about: #ExternalSource Directive
- [#If...Then...#Else](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/directives/if-then-else-directives.md): Learn more about: #If...Then...#Else Directives
- [#Region](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/directives/region-directive.md): Learn how to group related lines of code using region directives in Visual Basic.
- [#Disable and #Enable](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/directives/disable-enable.md): Learn more about: #Disable and #Enable directives (Visual Basic)
